item.title: ALDO // EXPERIENCE DESIGNER
item.description: Hi, I'm an Experience Designer. I practice Human Centered Design (HCD) that is brand and strategy centric. My expertise is in prototyping for digital and physical experiences. My experience includes design, UX, UI, IXD, and visual communications.

item.title: ALDO // EXPERIENCE DESIGNER
item.description: Hi, I'm an Experience Designer. I practice Human Centered Design (HCD) that is brand and strategy centric. My expertise is in prototyping for digital and physical experiences. My experience includes design, UX, UI, IXD, and visual communications.

item.title: Resume | ALDO
item.description: The resume of Experience Designer Aldo Padilla.

item.title: DraftHouse - AIA | ALDO
item.description: The American Institute of Architects sought to change the public perception of architects and architecture and also introduce an app that would help guide and excite emerging architects.

item.title: LEAP | ALDO
item.description: A digital magazine that explores alternative navigation and animations.

item.title: Vis | ALDO
item.description: VIS is the rebrand of an existing product that is a real-time blood glucose monitor.

item.title: Mountain Hardwear | ALDO
item.description: Peak is a product brand-manifestation for Mountain Hardwear.

item.title: Five Guys | ALDO
item.description: A visual order building app for the Five Guys Burger restaurant chain. Designed and prototyped by Aldo Padilla using Proto.io.

item.title: Future Hype | ALDO
item.description: What do brand brands in the future look like?

item.title: VA is for all lovers | ALDO
item.description: An interactive heart that brings people together under happiness and love.

item.title: Zeddy - Zombie Teddy | ALDO
item.description: ZEDDY, a zombie teddy bear that trains toddlers for the zombie apocalypse. It's really a toy hack designed with the blind and/or mute child in mind; then wrapped into the zombie theme
